name: Everstake
description: Everstake is one of the world biggest validators, servicing 735,000+ users across 70+ blockchains. As an operator on Ethereum, we handle a share of 1.9 staked supply, or 600,000+ ETH from 9,000+ stakers. Everstake has validated Ethereum since PoS genesis, retaining a slashing-free operation. We boast ~99.9 uptime, battle-tested infrastructure, and a team of seasoned experts. In EigenLayer, Everstake mission is to support the most promising AVSs and provide the best delegation services for stakers.
